title: Electronic Charm 2 Watch Face

descriptionHTML:
Features:
✔ Hour, Date, Month, Year
✔ Battery indicator
✔ Phone battery indicator
✔ Daily steps counter
✔ Two modes: normal and ambient
✔ Resolution:320*320
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch


Configuration:
✔ choose colors



Tip 1

If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face



If you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482
Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
